segments.pli: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, ādīnavā muṭṭhassatissa asampajānassa niddaṃ okkamayato.
segments.en: “Mendicants, there are these five drawbacks of falling asleep unmindful and unaware.

segments.pli: Dukkhaṃ supati, dukkhaṃ paṭibujjhati, pāpakaṃ supinaṃ passati, devatā na rakkhanti, asuci muccati.
segments.en: You sleep badly and wake miserably. You have bad dreams. The deities don’t protect you. And you emit semen.

segments.pli: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā muṭṭhassatissa asampajānassa niddaṃ okkamayato.
segments.en: These are the five drawbacks of falling asleep unmindful and unaware.

segments.pli: Pañcime, bhikkhave, ānisaṃsā upaṭṭhitassatissa sampajānassa niddaṃ okkamayato.
segments.en: There are these five benefits of falling asleep mindful and aware.

segments.pli: Sukhaṃ supati, sukhaṃ paṭibujjhati, na pāpakaṃ supinaṃ passati, devatā rakkhanti, asuci na muccati.
segments.en: You sleep well and wake happily. You don’t have bad dreams. The deities protect you. And you don’t emit semen.

segments.pli: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṃsā upaṭṭhitassatissa sampajānassa niddaṃ okkamayato”ti.
segments.en: These are the five benefits of falling asleep mindful and aware.”
